summary: This is an automatic out-of-office email reply from a legal professional involved in United States v. Epstein (19 Cr. 490), indicating they are on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact information for urgent matters related to the case.

persons.name: Ronnie Abrams
persons.context: The Honorable Ronnie Abrams is mentioned as the judge before whom the email sender is currently on trial.

persons.name: E stein
persons.context: Referenced in the case caption 'United States v. E stein 19 Cr. 490 (RMB)' as the defendant. The name appears with a space, likely a typographical error for Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Judge Ronnie Abrams is presiding over the criminal case United States v. E stein (19 Cr. 490).

events.title: Automatic email reply from legal professional
events.description: An automatic out-of-office email reply is sent, indicating the sender is on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams and providing contact instructions for the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email is an automatic reply dated August 27, 2019, from a legal professional involved in the Epstein criminal case.
The sender indicates they are on trial before Judge Ronnie Abrams, suggesting active legal proceedings in the Epstein case at that time.
The case is identified as United States v. E stein 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), confirming the federal criminal prosecution of Jeffrey Epstein.
Contact information for Assistant U.S. Attorneys (AUSAs) is provided for urgent matters related to the Epstein case.
